mapper.sql: id, open_id, evaluation_date, study_skill, responsibility, communication, confidence, knowledge_storage, pm_skill, operation_skill, data_analysis, office_skill, pmo_skill, team_work, promotion_training, strategic_thinking, business_thinking, decision_skill, innovation_skill,ranking,score, percent, create_time, update_time,tencent_grade,byte_grade, ali_grade,meituan_grade
mapper.select:
select
from user_pm_evaluation where open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by create_time desc limit 1

select
from user_pm_evaluation where open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by create_time asc limit 1

select
from user_pm_evaluation where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by create_time desc limit 1
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user_pm_evaluation (open_id, evaluation_date, study_skill, responsibility, communication, confidence, knowledge_storage, pm_skill, operation_skill, data_analysis, office_skill, pmo_skill, team_work, promotion_training, strategic_thinking, business_thinking, decision_skill, innovation_skill, create_time, update_time,ranking,score, percent, tencent_grade, byte_grade, ali_grade, meituan_grade) values (#{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaluationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{studySkill,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{responsibility,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{communication,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{confidence,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{knowledgeStorage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pmSkill,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{operationSkill,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dataAnalysis,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{officeSkill,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pmoSkill,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{teamWork,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{promotionTraining,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{strategicThinking,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{businessThinking,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{decisionSkill,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{innovationSkill,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, now(), now(), #{ranking,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{percent,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{tencentGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byteGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aliGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meituanGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
